00234 #define OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00235 { \
00236    .id = OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00237    .options = { \
00238                 .type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00239                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00240               }, \
00241    .attributesAmount = ZCL_OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBTUES_AMOUNT, \
00242    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00243    .commandsAmount = ZCL_OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00244    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00245 }
00246 
00247 #define OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00248 { \
00249    .id = OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_ID, \
00250    .options = { \
00251                 .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, \
00252                 .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY, \
00253               }, \
00254    .attributesAmount = ZCL_OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00255    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00256    .commandsAmount = ZCL_OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00257    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00258 }

00295 BEGIN_PACK
00296 
00301 typedef struct PACK
00302 {
00303   struct PACK
00304   {
00305     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00306     uint8_t type;
00307     uint8_t properties;
00308     uint8_t value;
00309     ZCL_ReportTime_t  reportCounter;     
00310     ZCL_ReportTime_t  minReportInterval; 
00311     ZCL_ReportTime_t  maxReportInterval; 
00312     uint8_t           reportableChange;  
00313     ZCL_ReportTime_t  timeoutPeriod;     
00314     uint8_t           lastReportedValue; 
00315     uint8_t minVal;
00316     uint8_t maxVal;
00317   } occupancy;
00318 
00319   struct PACK
00320   {
00321     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00322     uint8_t type;
00323     uint8_t properties;
00324     uint8_t value;
00325     uint8_t minVal;
00326     uint8_t maxVal;
00327   } occupancySensorType;
00328 
00329   struct PACK
00330   {
00331     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00332     uint8_t type;
00333     uint8_t properties;
00334     uint8_t value;
00335     uint8_t minVal;
00336     uint8_t maxVal;
00337   } occupancySensorTypeBitmap;
00338 
00339   struct PACK
00340   {
00341     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00342     uint8_t type;
00343     uint8_t properties;
00344     uint16_t value;
00345     uint16_t minVal;
00346     uint16_t maxVal;
00347   } PIROccupiedToUnoccupiedDelay;
00348 
00349   struct PACK
00350   {
00351     ZCL_AttributeId_t id;
00352     uint8_t type;
00353     uint8_t properties;
00354     uint16_t value;
00355     uint16_t minVal;
00356     uint16_t maxVal;
